name: Embers of Regret
description:
Embers of Regret  A game by Conner Arrington, Della Bryant, and Jolie "Sotto" Eppes

This is the Phase 4 (final) build of Ember of Regrets - a semester long project for MART 581D at U of SC!

CONTROLS:

  • Move Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - Interact with Item
  • D - Drop Item

CONTACT:

  • Conner Arrington - Coding, Sound Design, Narrative Design:
    • @eraserlark
  • Della - 3D Modeling, Animation, Art Design:
    • https://predellable.myportfolio.com/
  • Jolie - 2D Art Assets, Art Design, Environment/Character Design:
    • @Mellottonin
